expense account.translation[0].definitio: money that is available to someone who works for a company so that they can pay for meals, hotels etc when travelling or entertaining people for work
I have an expense account and spend about £10,000 a year on entertaining.
expense account.translation[1].definitio: a company account that an employee can use for money that they have to spend as part of their job, for example on hotels, meals etc
I have an expense account and spend about £20,000 a year on entertaining clients.
